feedback_loops.tension: Capital tension: $30-50K raise may be insufficient given rising CPMs, zero switching costs, and category creation costs

feedback_loops.tension: Two conflicting theses existed (ODD-1 broad vs Thesis narrow). Porter's, ICP, and internal evidence all support narrow.
feedback_loops.resolution: ODD-1 reclassified as v0/superseded. Thesis sheet is canonical. See Strategic_Foundation_Analysis.md

feedback_loops.tension: VOC produced 31 LMNT quotes at saturation but data never connected to Interview Insights Synthesis sheet
feedback_loops.resolution: Interview Insights backfilled with LMNT proxy data. Labeled as proxy throughout. Must be replaced with IonWave-specific data post-launch.

key_blockers: No financial model linked to thesis; Right to Win reframed (singular: marine plasma positioning); sub-segment sized at $300K-$1.5M (thesis reframed — marine plasma = differentiation tool, not market definition)
next_action: Build/audit 08_Financial_Model; validate $30K MRR Year 1 target; research Female Wellness ICP; collect fasting-specific VOC
